MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the LL48 postcode area of Minffordd, affecting properties in Tyddyn Llwyn Terrace and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 9:51am. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and have established that there is an underground cable fault affecting the remaining customers. Our specialists are now on site and will work to restore power to all remaining customers as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5:55pm on 24th February 2021.
